Gui

Interface MultiplayerGui

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CardinalGui, HungarianGui

    public interface MultiplayerGui
    This interface contains abstract methods needed in Graphical User Interface of a Multiplayer(Player+Bots) game of DominoGame.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String askName()
      Asks the name of the Player playing a Multiplayer game of DominoGame.
      int readFromHand()
      Reads the tile to be played from Player's hand and returns an integer representing it.
      void showHand(SetOfTiles setOfTiles)
      Shows hand of tiles of the Player playing a Multiplayer game of DominoGame.
      void showInvalidInput()
      Shows InvalidInput when entered input is incorrect.
      void showLine(SetOfTiles setOfTiles)
      Shows the Line of Tiles that are played by Bots and Player.
      void showPoints(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
      Shows the points collected by Player-Bots playing the game.
      void showWinner(java.lang.String name)
      Shows the Winner of the Multiplayer game of DominoGame.

    • Method Detail

        Reads the tile to be played from Player's hand and returns an integer representing it.

        void showInvalidInput()
        Shows InvalidInput when entered input is incorrect.

      • showHand

        void showHand(SetOfTiles setOfTiles)
        Shows hand of tiles of the Player playing a Multiplayer game of DominoGame.
        Parameters:

      • showWinner

        void showWinner(java.lang.String name)
        Shows the Winner of the Multiplayer game of DominoGame.

      • showLine

        void showLine(SetOfTiles setOfTiles)
        Shows the Line of Tiles that are played by Bots and Player.
        Parameters:
        setOfTiles - SetOfTiles representing the tiles that are put on Line.

      • showPoints

        void showPoints(java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
        Shows the points collected by Player-Bots playing the game.
        Parameters:
        players - representing the names of the players.
